<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pdb/tpistreamheader">TpiStreamHeader</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a> = Allocator.Allocate&lt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pdb/tpistreamheader">TpiStreamHeader</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;TypeRecordBytes = TypeRecordBytes;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashAuxStreamIndex = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0a7a9a9849fa2f1e5dec7a99ba9530da">kInvalidStreamIndex</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;NumHashBuckets = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e0381dca94b7c0bf6f0e25b356228b">MaxTpiHashBuckets</a> - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recall that hash values go into a completely different stream identified by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the &#96;HashStreamIndex&#96; field of the &#96;TpiStreamHeader&#96;.  Therefore, the data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// begins at offset 0 of this independent stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashValueBuffer.Off = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashValueBuffer.Length = calculateHashBufferSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We never write any adjustments into our PDBs, so this is usually some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset with zero length.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashAdjBuffer.Off = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashValueBuffer.Off + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashValueBuffer.Length;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashAdjBuffer.Length = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;IndexOffsetBuffer.Off = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashAdjBuffer.Off + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;HashAdjBuffer.Length;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>-&gt;IndexOffsetBuffer.Length = calculateIndexOffsetSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Header = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ae42219072d798876e6b08e6b78614ff6">H</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; TypeHashes.size(); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Rec : TypeRecBuffers) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Rec.empty() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Attempting to write an empty type record shifts &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((Rec.size() &amp; 3) == 0) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;The type record&#39;s size is not a multiple of 4 bytes which will &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC = Writer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#abb614d7e749a1af26c1d719b28ba4fb7">writeBytes</a>(Rec))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HashStreamIndex != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0a7a9a9849fa2f1e5dec7a99ba9530da">kInvalidStreamIndex</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
